title: Homemade Lavender London Fog
description: Use this ridiculously simple homemade lavender syrup recipe to take your London Fog up a notch! This Lavender London Fog recipe is DELISH! A few months ago, I was at a coffee shop with friends and, on a whim, I ordered a Lavender London Fog. I’ve loved having a London Fog for years but I’dRead More
author: Crystal Paine
